black.content: "Alright, Gohan, keep _ down." "I'm trying, Krillin, but I can't seem to get it as low as yours..."
"Look at that! I'm going to call you _!" "My name is Dende."
Man, Vegeta just ENDED _!
"W-wait, Vegeta! We could rule the universe! As _ and wife!"

"Please, you still owe me a space soda from our last set!" "Well, you owe me a space soda from the one before that!" "And where can you get all this spectacular space food? _. It's good food. In space."
Seems he threw my nervous system out of whack there! Can't quite feel _! ...There it is. Aaaaaaa...
Minion 43, come here. I need _.
"Huh, you don't look like _." "What, did my magnificent breasts tip you off?"
That's right, search all over for me, Zarbon! Of course, you'd never think to check inside _...
"They're kinda killing _." "Oh, we have more of those back at the ship. It's not like we're losing anything valuable."
"They're probably seeking out _!" "But... my dad's dead!" "I was referring to _!"
"I see it! My son! He's facing _! He's going to save our people!"
Now, stand still. It's your first time, so I'll be gentle. Now, relax, as I reach deep inside you and grab hold of _.
"Oh, you can't beat my speed. I'm _." "That's what she said!"
What I want YOU to do is pull up _, tighten _, and stop being _!
"I need you here within 24 hours. And make sure to bring _." "As you wish, Lord Frieza."
They're on _. And not only is _ there, but someone even stronger than him!
I haven't killed _ since I came to this god-forsaken planet! Not for lack of trying, mind you...
"While I was down on Earth, I got destroyed. All by _, his half-breed son, _, and an obese man with a sword."
"Hey, Vegeta! Can we stop at _?" "Nappa, if it will shut you up for five minutes, then fine!"
"Can I help you?" "No. But maybe I can help you." "Uh, I need _?"
Congratulations! You've just won an all-expenses paid trip to _!
I'd best get back to _. If I take too long, he'll really lay into me.
"_!" "Is that what you're going to yell out when you... Oh god!"
It was pretty impressive, how you went all _ on us. But now, you're all ours.
Silly Vegeta! The only thing Recoome sells is _!
Ah, seems we must speak the universal language: _.
"Gohan, I need to take you to _." "What, why?" "So _ can touch you and pull things out of you that you never knew you had."
I'm sorry, but at this point, all I hear is "Hit me Vegeta! Please kill me! God, _ makes me look fat!"
Oh god, no! _!
Just because we picked you up in the woods when you were a child doesn't mean that you can go around stealing _!
I will not stand for this! I will not be humiliated by _!
Why should I listen to you? You're surrounded by _!
"Why'd we attack this rock in the first place?" "I dunno, the mission briefing said this planet was full of _."
"Ginyu, hurry up, double time! Zarbon really screwed _ on this one!" "Lord Frieza, Vegeta's really giving us _!" "I'm coming, Zarbon! Quick, grab _!"
"Mister Popo, where did you send them?" "I'll tell you where they're not. _."
If we're going to be a team, we're going to need a name. Ooh, I know, how about Team _!
Ooo, I can see _! Oh, nah, oh, it's fake.
"Who drives it hard now?" "I thought I smelled _."
"I've been hiding another part of myself." "Where, in _?"
"Woohoo! I caught _! Oo, a cricket!" "Yeah, I'm _!" "Imma smash him!" "What?"
The doctor said I should be in here for a couple of months, what with _, _, and _.
Hey, look, Vegeta! He's like the _ of their group!

"How dare you! This was given to me by my father!" "I'm sorry, I'm sure your father was _." "I hated my father." "Oh, well then, I'm sure your father was _." "How dare you talk about my father like that!"
Let me introduce myself! My name is Frieza, and we're a traveling improv group! Let's give a demonstration. My men are _, and you're _. And, begin!
You're part of _ , and to top off this expositional onslaught, I am _!
Very impressive, killing _. _ could have done that at the zoo.
No! Goku! He's blasted himself off into space! What has _ done!
I'm of the upper class, a finer breed, the highest grade of _!
Soon you will face the end all, the be all, the please all, _!
"If you had to make up a phrase to describe how dead Yamcha is, what would it be?" "_."
Hi! I'm Nappa, and that is Vegeta. He was _!
This can't be happening! I'm _! I'm supposed to be _ by default!
Bardock, listen! Frieza's turned on us! He sent _ to take us out!
"You wear _ too?" "No Goku, I just love _ when I'm around you."
Good effort, but I'm _!
To be perfectly frank, you're _, you're just a lot less subtle about it...
"I am _..." "Oh, how cute! He's having a little dream."
Just because they're _ doesn't mean they're _.
First, we're going to do _, and then _, and then _! Ooooooh!
"Dende, what have you brought to Lord Guru's house?" "_! They claim they are here to help."
"Lord Frieza, I found a note!" "Let me see that! It just says 'Dear Freeza,' and it's a picture of _." "Can I see it, Lord Frieza?"
"So now you know the truth, Vegeta." "Yes, I do. And now I'm going to start repressing the truth! And the first step is _."
Realizing that, with _ dead, there's nobody left to protect you from _.
Goku! What have you done! You've blasted yourself into _!
Hey, don't get down on yourself! At least you've proven that your _ is stronger than ours!
You are now thinking about _. Have fun with that.
"Where's _?" "Here... and there... and there..."
"I do not think I want to go in there..." "Oh, don't worry, that's just _."
"Interesting! I'm going to pay him a... what do you call it?" "_?" "_, that's it!"
Fine, he can go to King Kai's. But first, he'll have to run on _!
"Stupid looking _ you've got there." "Yes. It tells time. And nothing else."
_ is the reason I go to therapy...
Oh my God! What happened to your head? You look like _!
New plan, Gohan! We're going to kick _!
Life sure has a funny way of working itself out. I find _, I kill them. I find _, I kill them. I find _, I take it. Let's see what else I can find.
And once again,  _ has solved all of my problems!
Nail, there's _ standing behind you. Kill it like the rest.
We here at Team FourStar do not condone _. We do, however, find it hilarious.
Oh look! Someone threw out _! Aren't you just adorable! I'm going to call you... Clark.
I've got a lovely bunch of _, do do do. Here they are all sitting in a bunch! One star, two star, all as big as _! Give them a toss, a planet across, that's how Vegeta wins, buh-bye!
Don't worry, Gohan! You can do it! You're _!
"Oh, hey, have you seen _?" "Oh, yes, he made a horrible mess of ze blood fountain." "Looks alright to me!" "IT USED TO BE _!"
"Nappa, what are you doing?" "It's _, Vegeta, I have to wait for him."
"Vegeta! You've got _ to get the drop on me." "What a coincidence, I was just looking for a pair."
He is called _, the eldest Namek.
I'm beginning to think that _ doesn't understand what I pay them for...
Alright maggots, listen up! Popo's about to teach you the pecking order. It goes you, _, _, _, Kami, then Popo. Any questions?
"There, I have unlocked _." "I don't feel that different." "It wasn't that much..."
Hey, look, it's _! That means he doesn't have _, right, Vegeta?
"A password! But, I've killed them all! There's no one left!" "...might I suggest _?" "Ugh, proceed."
Gohan used _! It was super-effective!
"Vegeta, did you hear that?" "Yeah, we're totally going to Earth to get our wish." "Yeah, we're going to get _!"
"Mister Gohan? Those things on that person's chest. What are they?" "Oh, on Bulma? Those are _."
Now, before I start training... I need _ to train to!
"Are you dense? _ is going to be here any second and then we're-" "Hey, Vegeta." "Hi, Ginyu. And then we're-"
I'm about to misuse _ upside _.
I swear to God, if anything happens to me while I'm gone, I'm _!
_, get in here.
"Thank you for liberating us! We shall erect statues of you!" "Well, isn't that nice, Vegeta!" "Out of _!"
You stupid...! Ugly...! His name was _!
"Hm? What was that?" "QUACK" "Oh, it's just _."
Let me put this in a way you'll understand. I'm about to blow _ all over _.
I hate to tell you this, kid, but your dad's _. Actually, I kinda like saying that!
While I was on Earth, I learned a new trick. I can sense _.
"I shouldn't leave you alone." "I have Dende. He is _ of our kind." "...there's only three of us left."
We'll go to _ , find _ , and kill everyone! And we'll be there in about a year! Depending on filler, of course.
I'm going to end this! With _! ...kind of attack.
"Is there anything you want me to tell her, daddy?" "Yes. Tell her to put dinner on. Because I'm _."
Nappa majored in _ at _ University. With a minor in pain!
Huh? What's that? Denise? Denise, is that _? Leave me alone! You already took the kids, what more do you want!?
That watch! It was no watch at all! It was some kind of... _ locator!
They've broken _. I've failed in my mission to find _. I've even lost my tail. But at least, it can't get any worse from here.
Anyway, I figured that, to unleash your potential, I'm going to have to put you in _. I'm going to throw you at _.
Well, if it isn't Mr. _ himself!
First, I'm going to make you _. And then, I'm going to use you for _!
"He is known throughout the galaxy as _!" "Really?" "He's conquered _ and slaughtered _!" "Eeee!" "Stop it! Stop getting excited!"
"Attacking an opponent roughly four times stronger than you, _! Wait, what's the opposite of that?" "_?" "Right, thank you!"
Stop mocking me! *explosion noises* Hah! Take that, _!
"Yeah, that Bardock is _." "He conquers planets and doesn't afraid of anything." "Hm, doesn't afraid of anything, indeed!"
Vegeta! You think that just because you're _, you're the best there is at what you do! But let me tell you something, brother! You ain't no Wolverine, and you ain't got what it takes to step to _!

My psychic powers are unrivaled in all the galaxy! You stood there and mocked me! The whole world stood there and mocked me! But now, you're slaves to my whim! Feel it fall out from under you, your whole world shatter, as I! Am! _!
Don't worry, Little Green, they've gone to a better place. _. Where everyone has _, and they all get along...
Vegeta! How dare you ram into me while I think about _ and _!
"Are you okay?" "Yes, I'm fantastic. Nothing but _ and _ in here." "Ooh, can I come in, too?"
We heard about _! We know _ made it/them! Frieza is already on his way!
I am detecting several high power levels heading towards the planet. They are all _ and _.
Goku! You can't die! Here, I brought _!
"Goku, I swear to god, I will ride _ on this one!" "Oh my." "God dammit, Takei!"
Bardock's prophetic slumber was suddenly disturbed by _.
"Hello, Earth woman. You know what I want, now give it to me." "It's right there!" "Oh, I'm not here for _."
I really do love _. They don't leave much of a mess.
"And that's why I was considered _. Before Frieza blew it up." "He tends to do that. Also, huuurgh."
"We shall kill them! With _! Which we shall use to-" "Okay, yeah, right, we're _! They get it! Now shut up!"
The healing tank, I always thought you needed to be _. You know, to absorb all the healing juices.
"My mom want's me to become a-" "_!" "W-what?"
Mister Popo! We've got _ coming. Make sure you take good care of them!
"I... need _?" "I am -----!" (Pick one white card, use for both blanks.)
"Oh, I know, I think I'll call you _!" "Call me that again and I'll snap your neck." "...with that attitude, I don't think you should be friends with him, _."
I do not know what this _ is, but it sounds disappointing.
I can't believe this! We're stranded on an alien planet! It's like Pitch Black, only our Vin Diesel is _!
"We're going to find _! He may be _." "Please don't make jokes..."
Wow! I can feel it surging inside me! Every man, woman, and child! This... is _!
"Next, I must complete the '_' dance." "My father would command no such thing!" "You are correct, Lord Frieza, it was your brother!"
"You're going to be in real trouble when _ get's here! He's our strongest guy!" "Well then. I guess we better kill you all before he gets here, then."
Such tripe! Where's _, Kakarot? We're a race of _, bred to fight and conquer!
Sweetie, I don't see _ with that beer...
Here, take it. Just don't steal _.
Holy _ on _ , what is that?
"Look at you, Dodoria. So damned proud. And now, here you are, crying like _." "I AM one!"
"Oi, is that Guldo over there? Is he _?" "How tragic."
"Hey, Vegeta." "Oh, look, it's Guldo! You want _, boy?" "...do you think I'm a dog?"
"Consider yourself _ while I'm _." "Ooh, I like both those things!"
Are you _? I need to talk to you about _!
Bulma, stay here and call Roshi back on Earth! We may need _!
"Sir, I think they have business regarding _?" "Yeah, we came here looking for _."
Kai-o-ken times _!
You know, at a time like this, I only have one thing to say to you. _!
Protect me, _!
_? That won't work on me! I'm _!
Hey, look, Vegeta! _!
In the space of one episode, two aliens disguised themselves as _, took our heroes on a quest to find _, then stole it/them to make a wish, only to be betrayed by forgetting they didn't have _.
"Why is the gravity so heavy here?" "Well, I've got _ locked up in the center of my planet."
Raditz! Give me back _!
"Now you will have to deal with _." "Don't worry, Bulma, I'll protect you!" "I was talking to you, baldy."
I hope you've enjoyed _, because I'm going to put you back on _, where you belong.
Listen, we don't have much time! _ is on its way here, and we have to get ready!
"Ooh, _, Vegeta!" "Nappa, no, it's a trick!" "But Vegeta! Tricks are for kids."
"Hey, look, a visitor!" "Oh boy, we love _!"
"You going to eat _?" "What?" "Dibs."
Well, you see, I was just in the area and thought this would be a lovely place for _.
Apool couldn't handle _, much less Vegeta!
Crushed and broken beneath _. Yup, I think I'm done here.
"Gohan! That power! Did you see it? He can..." "Stop time?" "Summon _!"
Wait a second! _! His Saiyan blood! Everyone of Gohan's race can become _!
It must be made of something weak! Like paper mache! Or _!
That's right, I'm the most superior martial artist in the galaxy! And this is _.
By the way, would you like to see _? It's our prized possession, sacred on this planet!
I sense something within this young man. _ yet untapped. _ yet unleashed. Now hold still, while I unleash the valley of strength hidden within!
"Aaaaa!" "Shut up, _." "Yarr!" "Shut up, _."
I have to keep running! For the sake of _, _, and _!
He's fighting for the honor of _. Like a hero.
"Vegeta! Look! A Pokemon!" "I'm not a Pokemon! I'm _!"
Next time you see me, I will be _. Not that you stood a chance to begin with. I'm just... Saiyan.
Nail. Prepare to retrieve _. And _.
"These are them, folks, the terrible monsters that destroyed West City! Get a shot of _." "Um, which one, Jim?"
Face down with _ beating _! Is it Wednesday already, Zarbon?
"Hi there. I'm taking _." "Care to trade for one of yours?" "How 'bout no." "You drive a hard bargain."
Oh, I don't get _. I have men to do that for me.
I only hit you because I have pent up aggression against _. Take that.
I'll show him! I'll become the mighty Ozaru and... where's _?
"We're here to stop the senseless slaughter of _!" "92..." "_ has gone on for too long, and now you're going to pay." "355..."
"Well, we've finally sedated him. It took some alternative treatment." "Really? What did you use?" "Something I found under the sink. I think it was... _."
In the climactic battle, Bardock fought the entire invading force while shouting "_!"
Ah! _! My precious modeling career!
Okay, not bad. But still nothing compared to me. Now witness the power of _!
"Hey, Krillin, look! _!" "Wow, those things are huge!"
Time to do what any other red-blooded American would do in this situation. Get _!
Shut up, _! I'm not crazy, you're crazy!
"My power is _..."
In an act of self-sacrifice, Chiaotsu detonated himself to destroy _.
"Maybe Lord Frieza won't find me if I hide under a rock and don't fly around like a jackass saying-" "Come to papa, _!" "I was going to say 'come and get me, Frieza,' but that works, too!"
"Nail. Gather the rest of the Dragon Balls and wish for _." "Sir, that would be a grievous misuse of their powers."
After defeating Raditz, Piccolo grew _ , grabbed _ , and flew off.
"I've completed the first two trainings, King Kai!" "Yes, congratulations. You managed to catch _, and give _ a concussion." "You psychotic bastard!"
"Nail!" "What is it, Lord Guru?" "I saw _. It was pretty. Kick its ass."
"Mister _, sir? My friend Krillin said you could help us by... touching me." "Do I look Catholic to you?"
"All I've got to do now is stay under the radar and not fly around like a jackass saying -" "I've got _!" "I was going to say 'come and get me, Frieza,' but that works, too!"

Speed of light and strength of all! _ shall make them fall! Lord King Cold's army's strongest force! We'll beat them all, secure the course! If _ meets us as we pass, we'll shove our fists right up their ass!
"Vegeta! What does the scouter say about his power level?" "It's _." "What, really?" "Yup, kick his ass, Nappa."
"Say goodbye to _, Kakarot!" "Well, that's not very nice." "Of course not! Because I'm fucking evil!"
I'm contractually obligated by your father to dance the Dance of Joy after _.
The following is a non-profit, fan-based parody. _ , _ , and _ are all owned by FunImation, Toei Animation, and Akira Toriyama.
"Little bastards just hit me outta no where." "Oh, trust me, I know what it's like to take _."
I'm sorry, but if this shit goes any further south, we're going to hit _.
Oh, so he calls himself _! Pretentious prick. Nail! I shall henceforth be known as... _.
"Now it's _! Now it's _! Now it's Nappa!" "Wait, what the hell?"
"After repeated concerns about our personnel... exploding, we've decided to form _!" "Adorable."
"Zarbon, what the hell was that?" "I believe that was _, sir."
"Damn, man, you couldn't hit the broad side of _!" "That's because I'm too busy hitting the broad side of your mom!"
So, Chichi, hypothetically, what would you do if someone told you your son was _, and someone took _?
Dragon Balls, grant my wish! Make me, Lord Frieza, _!
Seriously. Five ancient sages of _ gathered one day on _ to proclaim your birth. And a hundred years later, when _ had aligned, you were born and made everyone around you a living hell!
I had a hell of a day, Vegeta! I sank their battleship! And _.

white: The crippling PTSD from being trained by Mister Popo.
Conveniently learning the Kai-o-ken and Spirit Bomb off screen.
Being severely injured by a berserking five year old.
An obese man with a sword.
Bubbles, King Kai's faithful simian companion.
Accidentally sending off your only companion, because Bubbles, Gregory, and Bojack don't count, dammit.
Sacrificing yourself to save the five year old you abused, instead of saving him literally any other way.
Being kicked through a mountain by a five year old.
Gohan snapping, verbosely swearing, and attacking the bad guys.
Gregory, King Kai's faithful cricket companion.
The many protruding tentacles of the violating tentacle monster.
Any old hillbilly with a shotgun.
Using the Eternal Dragon to wish Goku back to life instead of destroying the threat to the Earth.
Shouting "DODGE" at a five year old, then hitting him.
Grappling each other on ze cold ground, yah!.
Blowing yourself up to kill the bad guy, but failing.
Being defeated by a giant monkey that used to be a five year old.
A ship that breaks relativity because it's afraid of Mister Popo.
The Saibamen, cultivated life forms with the same power level as Raditz.
Draining the life out of the local wildlife in an attempt to kill a monkey.
Clothes Beam, Piccolo's most metro attack.
Liberating the bug planet, then blowing it up for your amusement.
Everyone's favorite game, Wheel Of Death!.
The hole I made in your stomach.
Having your hopes for your future dashed by prophetic visions of DragonBall GT.
An attack that takes five minutes to charge up.
Bojack, the unbelievably powerful space pirate locked in King Kai's planet so it can have gravity.
A radish looking for a carrot.
Kami, the wrinkled green guardian of Earth.
Mister Popo, staring at you creepily through your window.
Finding a new battlefield because the previous one is a little corpsey.
Throwing a five year old at a solid rock wall.
Training extremely hard, only to discover you're weaker than a five year old.
Being granted the ability to see the future by an incredibly stupid psychic space fish.
Not killing the bad guy because he said he was sorry.
Raditz, the weakest of the Saiyans.
A hard one to the face.
Our own two diabolical hands, which are comprised of sinister fingers.
The most terrifying and evil person there is.
Almost being defeated by Yajirobe a second time.
A five year old turning into a giant gorilla and leveling everything in a five mile radius.
Disabling Raditz by grabbing his... tail.
A toilet that screams at you in German.
A power level over nine thousand.
The Dance of Cheering You Up.
A poorly executed plan telepathically transmitted by King Kai.
The lowest power level in the nursery.
Krillin wearing a hat with "Kulilin" written on it.
A major in Child Psychology, with a minor in Pain!.
The brain damage. And the brain damage. And the brain damage.
A thirsty demon princess with the voice of David Hayter.
The slaughter of an entire race of fish people by enormous rampaging space gorillas, set to an upbeat 80s song.
A series of awful Saiyan puns.
Sending Vegeta a disturbing photo of bugs mating.
Dropping baby Goku on his head.
Squeezing Goku like a squeaky pet toy.
A reference to Jojo's Bizarre Adventure.
Recoome (it rhymes with doom, and you're going to be hurtin' all too soon).
Accidentally killing the guy that makes your magic wish orbs work.
Goku's inability to comprehend the act of mating.
The flamboyant posing of the Ginyu Force.
Piccolo penetrating two dudes at the same time.
What Zarbon did to you while you were unconscious.
Princess Snake's cardboard box of stealth.
Visiting a bug planet, killing the inhabitants, then forcing its leaders to mate for your amusement.
King Yamma, receptionist of the underworld.
A dead race of space warriors called the Saiyans.
The most beautiful, and fertile, woman on my home planet.
Yelling at a five year old to try to get him to shut up.
My marijuana patch, uh, I mean, my carrot patch, yeah!.
Accidentally teamkilling your best friend. Twice.
Beating up a five year old.
Shouting "DODGE" at a five year old, after hitting him.
Arriving after most of your friends have been killed by the bad guys, because you stopped for a snack.
A bitch of an itch on my left ass cheek.
Hell's own demonic, vaguely homosexual German fitness instructors, Gaz and Mez.
Makansa... Makansekapa... Oh, to hell with it! Special Beam Cannon!.
A fancy barbeque with a god damn pig.

pack.name: Dragonball Z Abridged: The Complete Journey
